metadata.title: USN-4715-1 -- Django vulnerability
metadata.description: Wang Baohua discovered that Django incorrectly extracted archive files. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to extract files outside of their expected location.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4715-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-django - 2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.3 python-django-doc - 2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.3 No subscription required
